items.title: Umesh Agarwal of 360 ONE shares his filters for stock selection; should be a unique player and double earnings in 3 years
items.description: Agarwal invests in companies that are expanding faster than their respective industries, operating in large markets with substantial Total Addressable Market (TAM), and capable of doubling earnings within three years.

items.title: More than 450 smallcaps lost between 10-41%; index slips 22% from record high
items.description: All the sectoral indices ended in the red this week with Nifty Realty index shed 9.4 percent, Nifty Media fell 8 percent, Nifty Energy index declined 7 percent, Nifty Auto index shed 6 percent, Nifty Pharma down 5.7 percent and Nifty PSU Bank index shed 5.2 percent.

items.title: Market snaps 2-week winning run to post biggest weekly loss in 2 months
items.description: During the week, the Indian rupee tested fresh record low of 87.95 but managed to close 59 paise higher at 86.83 per dollar on February 14 against the February 7 closing of 87.42.
